plan_steps.step: Set up prerequisites: Install Taskfile, Agentman, and obtain OpenAI API key
Download setup instructions from pAI repository
Use GitHub Copilot or agentic coder to follow setup instructions automatically
Configure @Home context with personal automation agents (Gmail Curator, Newsletter)
Configure @Work context with professional workflow agents (PR Auditor, Test Coverage)
Create and customize ME.md files for personal context in each agent directory
Test individual agents locally using 'task run' command
Deploy agents to GitHub Actions for automated scheduling
Monitor agent performance and adjust configurations as needed
Expand agent library with additional custom workflows based on personal needs
